| History                 = The '''Steel Lotus Group''' and three other [[Triads (Earth-616)|Triads]] divided up the criminal empire of [[Zheng Zu (Earth-616)|Fu Manchu]] after his apparent death a few years earlier. Leading the Steel Lotus at the time was the corpulent crimelord [[Hsien Ming-Ho (Earth-616)|Hsieng Ming-Ho]], according to [[MI6 (Earth-616)|MI6]] intelligence.{{r|X-Men Vol 2 62}} The Triad was one of several that came under the rule of the [[Zheng Bao Yu (Earth-616)|Cursed Lotus]] when she united Hong Kong's underworld and used the Triads to expand her drug empire.{{r|Journey into Mystery Vol 1 514}}
